hero.title: CivicTech serving African democracies
hero.description: AfricTivistes is a pan-African network that promotes a democratic, inclusive and sovereign Africa in the digital age, through innovative technological solutions.

about.title: About AfricTivistes
about.description: Founded in 2015, AfricTivistes is a pan-African network based in Dakar that works for a democratic, inclusive and sovereign Africa in the digital age.

content.paragraph1: At the crossroads of civic innovation and citizen engagement, AfricTivistes has established itself as a key player in democratic transformation on the continent.
content.paragraph2: In a continental context marked by growing governance challenges, the organization deploys structuring projects and initiatives that reflect the maturity of its approach and the relevance of its vision. It promotes participatory democracy, driven by connected, informed citizens who are fully engaged in processes of change.
content.paragraph3: Through its actions, AfricTivistes defends augmented citizenship, where digital technologies become tools for transparency, accountability and social transformation.

about.quote: Resolutely focused on the future, AfricTivistes builds innovative responses to contemporary democratic challenges, mobilizing the continent's vital forces to build a more just, free and digital Africa.

video.title: Discover Our Initiatives
video.description: Dive into the world of AfricTivistes through this video compilation of our various initiatives and activities across Africa.
video.tagline: Together, let's transform governance in Africa through technology
video.projects: This video presents our flagship projects: MOOC Democracy, Soobu.tech, Farafina.tech, Citizen Lab, Charter Project Africa and Taxaw Temm.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Discover our innovative initiatives that align with our strategic axes to strengthen democracy, transparency and citizen engagement in Africa in the digital age.

items.title: MOOC Democracy
items.description: Online course on democracy, elections and governance to strengthen the capacities of African citizens and activists.

items.title: Soobu.tech
items.description: Platform for open governance and transparency, enabling the mapping of citizen initiatives related to elections.

items.title: Farafina.tech
items.description: Digital innovation hub for civic engagement, providing electoral and democratic data across Africa.

items.title: Citizen Lab
items.description: Training and tools for civil society, incubating citizen-initiated civic tech solutions for active participation.

items.title: Charter Project Africa
items.description: Initiative for democratic governance promoting the African Charter on Democracy, Elections and Governance.

items.title: Taxaw Temm
items.description: Cybersecurity training program for women, aimed at defending digital rights and combating online violence.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Since 2015, AfricTivistes has been transforming governance in Africa through innovative technological initiatives that support a democratic, inclusive and sovereign Africa.

items.title: Civic Education
items.description: Over 2000 learners trained through our MOOC on democracy, elections and governance.

items.title: Electoral Transparency
items.description: Support for 10 electoral processes across Africa, contributing to more transparent elections.

items.title: Digital Empowerment
items.description: Training of more than 500 women in cybersecurity to defend their digital rights and fight against online violence.

items.title: Citizen Engagement
items.description: Development of platforms enabling citizens to actively participate in democratic processes.

items.title: Civic Innovation
items.description: Creation of digital tools adapted to the specific challenges of governance in Africa.

items.title: Pan-African Network
items.description: Building a network of more than 400 activists and innovators in 45 African countries since 2015.

conference.title: West Africa CivicTech Conference 2025
conference.description: Join us in Lagos, Nigeria, from May 19-21, 2025 for the largest conference on civic innovation and democratic technology in West Africa.

features.title: Networking
features.description: Meet civic tech innovators and activists from across West Africa.

features.title: Hack4Democracy
features.description: Participate in the hackathon to develop digital solutions for democracy.

features.title: Workshops
features.description: Attend workshops on the latest trends in civic innovation and digital rights.

features.title: Exhibition
features.description: Discover innovative projects from AfricTivistes and its partners for a more democratic Africa.

partnership.title: Partnership Announcement
partnership.description: We are delighted to announce our official partnership with CivicHive for the West Africa 2025 Civic Tech Conference as a Francophone Advocacy Partner! The conference aims to break down language and digital barriers, and strengthen #CivicTech innovation across West Africa, in order to promote democracy and build more just and inclusive societies.
